thread.section_title: DHL Beoordelingen | Beoordelingen van DHL | www.dhl.nl
thread.title: JUSTYNA HAJDUGA

author: JUSTYNA HAJDUGA
title: JUSTYNA HAJDUGA
text:
This is a joke. I sent the parcel on February 11th, two days later I received an email that the parcel was delivered.
Called the DHL to be told it only means that the parcel was delivered to the depot and not to the addressee.
Called again today only to find out the parcel didn't even leave the Netherlands. They need to investigate - I need to fill out the form and wait 10 (!!!) working days for the "investigation team" to do their investigation.
Unbelievable!
